ValidationRule.description: Force users to populate the Main Issue field, when specific Status values are chosen.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), (ISPICKVAL(Main_Issue__c, '')), ( (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Reviewed in PAC - Late Payment/Warranty Requested')) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Reviewed in PAC - Attempting Abatement with Agency')) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Reviewed in PAC - Attempting Appeal with Agency')) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Paid Balance - PAC working with agency to abate/refund')) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Paid Balance - PAC working with agency to appeal/refund')) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - Communicated Findings to Client')) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - Field to Relay Findings to Client')) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value in the Main Issue field.
